data.name: CoH 2 - Soviet Commander: Partisan Tactics
data.detailed_description:
SOVIET COMMANDER: Partisan Tactics
Make use of the Soviet Partisan network to harass enemies from behind the lines while destroying them with the soviet main army.

  • Mark Vehicle
    Targeted vehicle is subject to an increase in focused fire from nearby opponents.
  • Spy Network
    Using underground infiltration units, temporarily reveal all enemy units on the minimap.
  • Partisan Tank Hunters
    Anti Vehicle Partisans are irregular military units who excel at destroying vehicles behind the lines.
  • Radio Intercept
    Intercepts enemy radio transmissions providing valuable intel on enemy actions
  • Partisan Troops
    Partisans are irregular military units who excel at destroying target of opportunity behind the lines.

data.short_description: SOVIET COMMANDER: Partisan TacticsMake use of the Soviet Partisan network to harass enemies from behind the lines while destroying them with the soviet main army.Mark VehicleTargeted vehicle is subject to an increase in focused fire from nearby opponents.
data.supported_languages:
Czech, English*, French*, German*, Italian, Polish*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: 32bit Vista
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT)
  • DirectX®: 11
  • Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
  • Internet: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 2.4Ghz Intel
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 1GB*
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB**
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
